Package org.numenta.nupic.encoders

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CoordinateOrder  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CategoryEncoder
    Encodes a list of discrete categories (described by strings), that aren't related to each other, so we never emit a mixture of categories.
    CategoryEncoder.Builder
    Returns a EncoderBuilder for constructing CategoryEncoders The base class architecture is put together in such a way where boilerplate initialization can be kept to a minimum for implementing subclasses.
    CategoryEncoderTest  
    CoordinateEncoder  
    CoordinateEncoder.Builder
    Returns a EncoderBuilder for constructing CoordinateEncoders The base class architecture is put together in such a way where boilerplate initialization can be kept to a minimum for implementing subclasses.
    CoordinateEncoderTest  
    DecodeResult
    Tuple to contain the results of an Encoder's decoded values.
    Encoder<T>
    An encoder takes a value and encodes it with a partial sparse representation of bits.
    Encoder.Builder<K,E>
    Base class for Encoder builders
    EncoderResult
    Tuple to represent the results of computations in different forms.
    EncoderTuple
    Subclass of Tuple specialized to hold the 3-value contents of an "encoder tuple".
    RangeList
    Convenience subclass of Tuple to contain the list of ranges expressed for a particular decoded output of an Encoder by using tightly constrained types without the verbosity at the instantiation site.
    ScalarEncoder
    DOCUMENTATION TAKEN DIRECTLY FROM THE PYTHON VERSION: A scalar encoder encodes a numeric (floating point) value into an array of bits.
    ScalarEncoder.Builder
    Returns a EncoderBuilder for constructing ScalarEncoders The base class architecture is put together in such a way where boilerplate initialization can be kept to a minimum for implementing subclasses.
    ScalarEncoderTest
